meta_data.description: 1080 Sq. Ft. - Rent 2 BHK Apartment / Flat in Ace City, Sector 1 Greater Noida West * 14 Property & locality photos * Semifurnished * - 4th floor (out of 26). View contact number for free. Click for complete details on 99acres.com

structured_data.description: This lovely 2 bhk apartment for rent in sector 1 greater noida west is available in one of greater noida's most popular projects, ace city. The flat is close to metro station, close to hospital, close to school and close to mall. Property has attached 2 bathrooms & 2 balconies with 2 rooms set in 920 sq.Ft. Carpet area. This flat is constructed on 1080 sq.Ft. Area. An independent others is available in this property. This flat lies on the 4th floor of a 26 storey building. Well maintained 1-5 years property. This property is semi-Furnished. Equipped with 14 light, 4 fan, 1 ac, 1 tv, 2 bed, 2 wardrobe, 1 geyser, 1 washing machine, 1 stove, 1 fridge, 1 water purifier, 1 modular kitchen, 1 chimney, 1 curtains and 1 exhaust fan. Ready to occupy from sat, 27 sep 2025, this property is ideal for family on any agreement type with a notice of 1 month for a duration of 11 months. We are demanding  25,000 for this unmatched property. Rent quoted excludes electricity & water charges. Refundable security deposit of  25000 to be paid for finalising the option. Built in features are reserved parking, feng shui / vaastu compliant, intercom facility, power back-Up, security / fire alarm and water storage etc. You will get access to swimming pool, fitness centre / gym, club house / community center, park, shopping centre, lift(s), visitor parking and maintenance staff etc. In this society. Additional features with this property include corner property, pet friendly, wheelchair friendly and in a gated society. Power backup: Full. The flat has a north-East orientation. The flat's flooring is marble.
